name: drop_sorting_from_list_items
statements:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS list_items_new (
      id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
      name TEXT NOT NULL,
      category TEXT,
      created_at INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (strftime('%s','now'))
    )
INSERT INTO list_items_new (id, name, category, created_at) SELECT id, name, category, created_at FROM list_items
ALTER TABLE list_items_new RENAME TO list_items
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_list_items_category_id ON list_items (category, id)
